timeline.message: OverlappingEdgeCheck, marking overlapping edges on atlas identifier instead of osm identifier.
OverlappingEdgeCheck, replacing getIdentifier with getOsmIdentifier for localized instruction.

timeline.bodyText: It looks like the items in wayIds should be atlas identifiers, otherwise the search will return true for all multi edge ways.
timeline.author: Bentleysb

timeline.message: OverlappingEdgeCheck, replacing way Ids list to contain atlas identifiers.
